msg.value:
The Subject and the Body can use these predefined values:
__device__: the device which send the log line which raise this alert.
__alert__: the Alert Name.
__level__: the Alert Level.
__log__: the complete log line.

Status Device can be:
Stopped: logs are directly dropped
Paused: logs are written but not parsed
Started: logs are fully handled

DataBase is only use to save alerts and to execute SQL Queries on Reports.
Server: (default: localhost)
User: (default: octopussy)
Password: (default: octopussy)
Base: (default: octopussy)

Jabber is used to send Alerts to Instant Messaging Contacts.
Server: (yourjabber.yourdomain.com)
User: (yourjabberuser)
Password: (yourjabberpassword)
More info on Jabber: http://www.jabber.org/

LDAP is used to get Contacts and Users.
Contacts Server: (yourldapserver.yourdomain.com)
Contacts Base: (ou=Contacts,dc=yourdomain,dc=com)
Contacts Filter:
Users Server: (yourldapserver.yourdomain.com)
Users Base: (ou=Users,dc=yourdomain,dc=com)
Users Filter:
More info on LDAP: http://www.openldap.org/

NSCA is used to send Alerts to the Nagios supervision console.
Binary: Name of the binary send_nsca
Configuration File: Filename of your send_nsca configuration file
Nagios Server: Address of your Nagios supervision console
Host defined in Nagios: Name of the Host defined in Nagios to handle Octopussy Alerts
Service defined in Nagios: Name of the Service defined in Nagios to handle Octopussy Alerts
More info on Nagios and NSCA: http://www.nagios.org/

Proxy is used to get updates through a proxy.
Server: (yourproxy.yourdomain.com)
Port: (proxy_port)
User: (proxy_user)
Password: (proxy_password)

SMTP is used to send Alerts and Reports to Contacts or contact Octopussy support.
Server: (yoursmtp.yourdomain.com)
Sender: (you@yourdomain.com)
